description:
The Pedestal designed by [00 architect](http://www.architecture00.net/) [Lynton Pepper](/designers/lynton-pepper) is the ideal companion to your workstation.

This little partner removes the need for lockers if space is a premium as each team member can store their personals, and even their laptop in a dedicated compartment, in a space conscious way. Also perfectly suitable in a hot-desk environment castors can be added to free the attachment it has to a particular [desk](/categories/desks).

The laptop compartment also features a locking tab for secure overnight [storage](/categories/storage).
name: Pedestal
